name: Overhook
description:
Survive the onslaught!

Weave through bullets. Capture drones. Sling it into destruction.

Overhook is a cross concept between rail shooter and fishing game. You have to survive until the track's end. Dodge each bullet. Pick every fuel to prolong your survival. Pull and sling drones to raise your chance of survival.

With guidance from various Mojiken's unique talents, we present a proof-of-concept. May your hook line through its target.

Game Control:

W A S DMove characterMouseAimLeft Mouse ButtonShoot
